# generated by GPT
# Block all crawlers from accessing the /private/ directory
User-agent: *
Disallow: /private/

# Allow Googlebot to access everything
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow:

# Allow Bingbot to access /public/ but not /private/
User-agent: Bingbot
Disallow: /private/
Allow: /public/

# Set a crawl delay for all other bots
User-agent: *
Crawl-delay: 10
